It's DD5.1 ; so 5.1 channels.  It's probably only the intro that is 2 channels as that is how it is broadcast.

I see his other torrent: Game.of.Thrones.S03E01.1080p.HDTV.x264-GOT [PublicHD]

@MyFootHurts
Actually, the encode is both 2.0 and 5.1, like kiwij said. The "previously on Game of Thrones" and "next time on Game of Thrones" segments are encoded in stereo, but the rest of the episode is in 5.1 surround. All of the releases on here are like that, it's how HBO broadcasts it.
